_source.text: A deeper look into 'literary genres' that mean to understand better what the sacred author meant to say had been looked at with suspicion before then (in the Church), if only because of abuses that had been made.

text: A **deeper** look into 'literary **genres**' that mean to understand **better** what the **sacred** author meant to
say had been looked at with suspicion before then (in the Church), if only **because** of abuses that had been made.
